hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: UI_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the Java Backend branch

flow-definition.script:
// Manually pulled from git based on configurations pipeline { agent any environment { BUILD_NAME = "DMAP App Binary Build" NOTIFYUSERS = 'kavyasrim@newtglobalcorp.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } parameters { string(name: 'UI_branch', defaultValue: 'Developer', description: 'Enter the name of the Java Backend branch') } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 5, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Checkout Code ") { steps { dir("UI"){ //deleteDir() echo "Checkout the UI code" //git branch: "${params.UI_branch}", credentialsId: 'Kavya_1709', url: 'https://github.com/newtglobalgit/DMAPP.git' } } } stage ("Sonar Analysis") { steps{ echo "UI sonar Analysis" dir("UI"){ sh "npm install" sh "sonar-scanner \ -Dsonar.projectKey=dmap_UI \ -Dsonar.projectName=dmap_UI \ -Dsonar.sources=src/ \ -Dsonar.exclusions=node_modules/ \ -Dsonar.host.url=http://192.168.3.148:9000/sonarqube \ -Dsonar.login=25534cb4ff60d377ca72aefd244d70eff8bfcf56" } } }}}
